text: Hey Tim, it looks like we sent feedback to your marketplace contact email on 12/21 with information on why the theme wasn't approved. Chris is out on vacation this week but can assist with follow up questions next week.
Hello, I am trying to publish template to the marketplace by following the instructions here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-requirements>
Im logged in using the developer account, but there is not a link to ‘Asset Marketplace’ in the top nav and I cannot seem to locate ‘Provider’ section of the account.
Any idea what I am missing?  When I click the Marketplace icon, there is no ‘Provider’ specific link or section I can find
So I should create a new account that is not the existing developer account?
